lore: Colt is the all-American character. Unfortunately, he isn’t all that great. Colt can be very difficult to get all of your bullets to go where you’d like them to, and he lacks many of the utilities that other Brawlers offer. But there’s an owner for everyone, and even Colt will find someone who can strike fear in the hearts of others when they’re at his controls.

mDefaultAbility.description: Colt lets his long-range revolvers do his talking for him. He never seems to run out of lines.
mDefaultAbility.name: Six-Shooters

mSuperAbility.description: Colt spins his chambers, rattling off a massive burst of bullets that will shred through almost anything.
mSuperAbility.name: Bullet Train

strengths: Can be lethal from long range.
Can puncture through walls with super ability.
Can strafe to accurately mirror opponents movements and deal a load of damage.
tips: Very basic without much usefulness to a team. Lacks utility.
No crowd control abilities, no movement buffs of any kind, and no gap closing, or escape abilities – Makes colt a sitting duck in most occasions.
Fragile and can be one-shot by stronger Brawlers.
Quite difficult for a new player to learn how to fire Colt effectively.
weaknesses: Very basic without much usefulness to a team. Lacks utility.
No crowd control abilities, no movement buffs of any kind, and no gap closing, or escape abilities – Makes colt a sitting duck in most occasions.
